item.title: Software Update for eClinicalGPS Production
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Software Update and System Downtime

Greenphire will be applying software updates to the eClinicalGPS Application in the Production environment, resulting in brief inaccessibility to the systems during the update. This includes backward compatible quality fixes.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 15, 21:30 - 22:30 EDT

Mar 15, 10:22 EDT
Scheduled - In this scheduled event Greenphire will apply software updates to the eClinicalGPS Application in our Production environment. During this time Greenphire systems may be briefly inaccessible while systems are updated.

This update includes the following changes:
> Backward compatible quality fixes

item.title: Software Update for eClinicalGPS UAT
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Software Updates for eClinicalGPS Application

During the scheduled maintenance, Greenphire will be applying software updates to the eClinicalGPS Application in the UAT environment. Access to Greenphire systems may be briefly affected while the updates are being implemented. This update includes backward compatible quality fixes.

Mar 15, 11:00 EDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 15, 10:21 EDT
Scheduled - In this scheduled event Greenphire will apply software updates to the eClinicalGPS Application in our UAT environment. During this time Greenphire systems may be briefly inaccessible while systems are updated.

item.title: ClinCard 2024.03.02 Production Feature Release
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Production Update Scheduled

Greenphire will be applying the 2024.03.02 release in our Production environment on March 15th, 2024. During this time, Greenphire systems may be briefly inaccessible while systems are updated. This update includes backward compatible quality and regulatory updates.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 15, 15:00 - 17:00 EDT

Mar 14, 11:29 EDT
Scheduled - On March 15th, 2024, Greenphire will apply the 2024.03.02 release in our Production environment. During this time Greenphire systems may be briefly inaccessible while systems are updated. This update includes the following changes:
> Backward compatible quality and regulatory updates
Release notes for this release can be found in our Knowledge Center at clincard.com.

item.title: ClinCard Payment Service Degradation
item.content:encoded:
[Low] - Investigating Delay in ClinCard Payments Summary: ClinCard is experiencing a delay in assigning cards and posting payments for some studies. The issue is being investigated, and updates will be provided on the Status Page. Please be patient as we work to resolve this inconvenience.

Mar 6, 17:59 EST
Resolved - The Payment Service degradation has been resolved. Thank you for your patience with this matter.

Mar 6, 17:48 EST
Investigating - ClinCard is currently experiencing a delay assigning cards and posting payments for some studies. Our teams are working to isolate and correct the issue as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Please monitor our Status Page for updates.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 1, 21:30 - 22:30 EST

Scheduled - On March 1st, 2024, Greenphire will apply the March 2024 release in our Production environment. During this time Greenphire systems may be briefly inaccessible while systems are updated. Release notes for this release can be found in our Knowledge Center at eclinicalgps.com.

item.title: eClinicalGPS Production System Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Routine Infrastructure Maintenance

Greenphire will be performing routine infrastructure maintenance between the hours of 9:00PM and 12:00AM ET on March 8, 2024. During this time, Greenphire systems may be briefly inaccessible while updates are being applied.

Summary: Greenphire will be conducting routine infrastructure maintenance, which may result in temporary inaccessibility of their systems.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 8, 21:00 EST  -  Mar 9, 00:00 EST

Feb 23, 14:04 EST
Scheduled - On Friday March 8, 2024 Greenphire will be performing routine infrastructure maintenance between the hours of 9:00PM and 12:00AM ET. During this time Greenphire systems may be inaccessible briefly while systems are updated.

Feb 23, 12:19 EST
Scheduled - On March 8th, Greenphire will apply the 2024.03.01 release in our Production and UAT environments. During this time Greenphire systems may be briefly inaccessible while systems are updated. Release notes for this release can be found in our Knowledge Center at eclinicalgps.com.

item.title: ClinCard Payment Service Degradation
item.content:encoded:
Feb 21, 10:33 EST
Resolved - Greenphire has confirmed all delayed payments are now posted. Thank you again for your patience with this issue.

Feb 21, 09:36 EST
Monitoring - The Payment Service degradation has been resolved and our teams are actively monitoring the issue to ensure payments are correctly posted.

Feb 21, 09:21 EST
Investigating - ClinCard is currently experiencing a delay posting payments to some cards. Our teams are working to isolate and correct the issue as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Please monitor our Status Page for updates.

During this time Greenphire systems should stay online however, there is a possibility of a momentary interruption as planned failover to redundant devices occurs.

item.title: ClinCard SMS Messaging Service Degradation
item.content:encoded:
Feb 3, 10:14 EST
Resolved - We have confirmed full SMS messaging functionality has been restored and the system is performing normally.

Feb 2, 23:03 EST
Monitoring - The cause of the performance degradation of the SMS Messaging Service has been identified, and a fix has been applied. Our teams have confirmed an immediate improvement in the outflow of SMS messages, and will continue to monitor our systems to ensure full recovery of functionality.

Feb 2, 14:49 EST
Investigating - ClinCard is experiencing a performance degradation with our SMS Messaging Service and some SMS messages may be delayed or missed. Our teams are working to isolate and correct the issue as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Please continue to monitor our Status Page for updates.

item.title: eClinicalGPS Inaccurate User Reporting
item.content:encoded:
Feb 2, 22:14 EST
Resolved - Greenphire has confirmed this issue has been resolved for all user reporting.

Feb 2, 16:56 EST
Monitoring - Greenphire has identied the root cause of the issue and has corrected the reporting information for existing users. A lag may temporarily exist for newly created users to appear in reporting.

Feb 2, 13:56 EST
Investigating - Greenphire is investigating an issue that may impact the accuracy of user information in some eClinicalGPS reports. This issue is isolated to reporting only and does not affect user access or permissions as defined in the application. Our teams are working to isolate and correct the issue as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and apologize for any inconvience this has caused. Please continue to monitor our Status Page for updates.

item.title: eClinicalGPS Service Degradation
item.content:encoded:
Jan 8, 17:29 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 8, 17:12 EST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jan 8, 14:08 EST
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jan 8, 10:33 EST
Investigating - eClincalGPS is currently experiencing a performance degradation preventing the validation of invoices due to currency localization for currency with a comma at the decimal. Our teams are working to isolate and correct the issue as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Please monitor our Status Page for updates.
